functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"translate":"浮遊石","color":"#80EEFF","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"少しの間浮遊を得て空を歩けるようになる","color":"#2DB9CE","italic":false}','{"translate":"しゃがむ事でゆっくりと降下できる","color":"#2DB9CE","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"C","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" スカイウォーク"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"共通",Name:"スカイウォーク",Level:1,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:7},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.105,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,21],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.105,Operation:1,UUID:[I;12,0,0,21],Slot:"offhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.07,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.07,Operation:1,UUID:[I;12,0,0,31],Slot:"offhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.2,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
